titleStmt.title: A reply in the defence of Oxford Petition, with a declaration of the academians teares for the decay of learning, or, The vniversities feares also the description of a reverend coachman which preached before a company of Brownists / by Tho. Herbert.
titleStmt.author: Herbert, Thomas, 1597-1642?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
